name: Rogue's Road
description:
Rogue's Road is a 2D platformer where you play as a rogue, whose purpose is to explore levels and find platforms to activate and open a door to the next level. 

Along the way you'll have to work your way around numerous traps and orcs. Try to find a path around, or engage your threats in melee combat using your daggers, or keep your distance and fight with your shurikens and kunais!

The game comes with 20 levels.

Hope you enjoy!
